Highlights.name: Accreditation & Credibility
Highlights.description: HRCI is the only HR certification body that seeks and maintains third-party accreditation for its credentials through the National Commission for Certifying Agencies (NCCA).

Highlights.name: Unrivaled Experience
Highlights.description: Since 1973, HRCI has set the global standard for HR expertise and excellence.  More than 500,000 HRCI-certified professionals in 150+ countries.

Highlights.name: Value & Affordability
Highlights.description: HRCI certification costs remain competitive with other HR certifying organizations and are significantly less expensive than an advanced degree.
